data.prompt:
Extract comprehensive customer insights from reviews about Multi-Function Combination Switches.
The output format is JSON in English:
{
"phy": {
"<PHYSICAL>": {
"<PID>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": [ID, …]
}
}
},
"perf": {
"<PERF>": {
"<perf_id>@<DETAIL>": {
"<SENT>": {<PERF_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
},
"use": {
"<USE>": {
"<SENT>": {<USE_REASON>: [ID, …]}
}
}
}

Definitions:
- <PID>: Unique ID for physical aspect ("phy"), starting from A. After Z, continue with AA, AB, and so on.
- <PHYSICAL>: Components or inherent physical properties of the Multi-Function Combination Switches without external interaction (e.g. dimensions, appearance, material type...)
- <DETAIL>: A self-contained detail summarized from the reviews.
- <SENT>: Sentiment polarity of the current <DETAIL> (- for negative, + for positive).
- ID: All review IDs mentioning the <DETAIL>
- <perf_id>: Unique ID for performance or functions ("perf"), starting from a. After z, continue with aa, ab, and so on.
- <PERF>: The Multi-Function Combination Switches' performance (e.g. flexibility, durability, ...) or behaviors under various conditions (e.g. temperature, force, chemicals...) without reference to any specific use case
- <PERF_REASON>: <PID> of the <PHYSICAL> explicitly mentioned as the cause of the <PERF>. Include all mentioned <PID>s. If no reason is mentioned, use "?". <PERF_REASON> and <PERF> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together (i.e. the same review ID are included at both locations)
- <USE>: The specific application, applicable object, method, tool, or environment for the product.
- <USE_REASON>: <perf_id> or <PID> causing the <USE>'s sentiment. Include all mentioned reasons, or "?" if none can be inferred. <USE_REASON> and <USE> should have the same sentiment polarity in the review where they are mentioned together.

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
- <PHYSICAL>/<PERF> and <DETAIL> MUST NOT include:
  * Generic statements without details (e.g., "good", "bad quality")
  * Issues unrelated to the product itself (e.g., "fast shipping", "delivery time")
- If a review mentions any physical aspect, related performance, or use together, extract them as separate entries under "phy," "perf," and "use," with no overlap.
- Make sure each <DETAIL> is under the most relevant <PHYSICAL> or <PERF> in the context of Multi-Function Combination Switches
- Preserve negations

Key Instructions:
- Break down reviews with multiple aspects, performances, or uses into individual entries.
- Escape special characters with backslash that could cause JSON syntax errors.
- Include only explicitly mentioned reasons, and use "?" where no reason is mentioned.

Final Checklist:
- Go through all reviews and ensure that no aspect, performance, use, or reason is omitted, even if only mentioned once.
- Review all entries to ensure proper separation between aspects, performances, and uses.

Print the JSON result only.
Input format:
<ID>#<review>

[[INPUT]]
0#Good switches and great value. These worked well for replacing an old double light switch. They're attractive and a good value. I haven't purchased many of this style of paddle switch, so not sure how the build quality matches up with other options out there. The plastic feels good, though a little lighter plastic on the paddles than I would have expected -- and the click sound when switching is a bit sharper (hollow sounding?) than I would prefer (though it makes a very secure click) -- Overall, the switches look and work great -- and seem to have good quality switching mechanisms.
1#Works just as I expected, easy to install. I don’t know how to do handy things around the house, but this was really straightforward and easy enough for a total novice to change out. Now I want to change out the rest of the switches in my house.
2#Quality. Pay a little more and get something of a better grade . This are a sure fire hazard
3#Great switches! Simple elegant rocker switches. Not much you can say about a light switch other than they worked and simple to install. They fit perfectly!
4#Loud! Switch works as described but switch has a loud click in on/off positions. If you are looking for a quiet switch this isn’t it.
5#Great upgrade. Easy install looks modern
6#Good quality at a better price. Seem to be good quality and installed as expected. Good value.
7#Sleek & Reliable Double Rocker Switch. This Greencycle double rocker switch looks great and works smoothly. It’s easy to install, well-built, and perfect for controlling two lights from one spot. A solid choice for home or office upgrades!
8#Functional. Installed easily and works as intended. I always wanted paddle switches. Affordable pricing as well.
9#Good quality. Good quality and easy to install.
10#They work. They do what they are supposed to do
11#Very happy with the product. These worked great, really well-made and easy to install
12#Good quality. Good quality for the price.
13#Light switch. Like them something different
14#One of two works, but how long? One of them didn't even need electrical connection to reveal its failure -- the switch paddle would not even stay in the off position. The second worked okay but felt a bit sketchy. I put it in a location where it will very seldom be used.
15#works as expected. needed this style switch to go into wall plates along side kasa smart switches, and in some cases to be the other switch on cares of 3 way circuits where there was no neutral wire. these worked perfect and look nice next to the smart switches.
16#Received ink cartridges. Two to a box. The box label states light switches but ink cartridges were in two of the four boxes. All are going back to keep it simple.
